name: 69: Itsuwari no Bishou

She is a girl with excellent grades, modest personality, reserved and smiling face. Midori Aoi is a smiling girl who has been making a desperate effort to produce a "smiley face". Today, Midori is enjoying a blissful moment of smiling and being loved not only by the opposite sex but also by the same sex. The result of the recent examination was an unexpected mistake, and she has fallen far from her position. Midori is in a hurry to find a way out of this situation, but her opponent is her homeroom teacher, Izumi Kuwabara, who is rumored to be a slacker. However, the opponent is much tougher than she had imagined, and she unintentionally uses the following method...... This is Ms. Yoshimura, the teacher's fiancée, isn't it? What is playing on Midori's phone is a scene of his teacher's fiancée, Maho Yoshimura, having fun with multiple students. Midori is brought to a dangerous negotiation with Izumi's leaping hands and bare flesh...... Midori realizes her blunder when she feels the pain of a towering rod poking deep into her first bud and twisting it.......

name: No Waifu No Life!
description:
Episode 1:

Owner's Wife:

The newlyweds had found a new house and went to greet their landlord, only to find that Murai, a former volleyball coach, had taken over the family business. Marin Momodate (maiden name) had bitter memories of Murai from her school days, and just as she was trying to avoid him as much as possible, she found him when she returned home after leaving the company on a long career break. Masashi, her husband, was put to sleep and the space was now just the two of them. The coach and she were sexfriends, and he rubs her tits as if it were a matter of course. Marin tries to refuse, but the past comes back to her, and she can't forget Murai's stubby, middle-aged body. Marin becomes addicted to each of his techniques, and her feelings gradually shift to becoming Murai's female toilet.

Mama to Tanetsuke no Su:

A mother continues to seduce her son, Yuri, with tongue kisses every day. When they were running out of patience with the excessive skinship, Hiroki, a friend of Yuri, came to visit them. Her husband is away on a long business trip, and the mother, frustrated, masturbates in her room. Hiroki happened to catch her in the act, and he threatened her to tell Yuri about it. It's a mother who allowed everything to Hiroki as she was told.

Episode 2:

Mamatomo Koubi Teaching:

Shizuku Ogisato is the mother of the next-door neighbor, Yoshi, who often comes over to visit. She is so naughty that it's hard to keep an eye on her, and there are rumors that she's doing extreme things behind the scenes. Secretly, Kazu masturbates day and night, thinking about Shizuku. Kazu gets an erection just by her pressing her breasts against him, who is in the middle of puberty, and when they are alone....

Ore Senzoku Micchaku Koubi Maid:

The Mochizuki family must designate a maid at a certain age. Reiji welcomes Fumi, who has been his best friend since he was a child, as his exclusive maid. Fumi is an adult woman with a husband. She is a little out of her element and has a close sense of distance. When Reiji returns home from hard work, her raging erotic appeal is so great that he has reached the limit of his ability to keep his reason. In fact, it is customary for the exclusive maid to engage in sexual intercourse, the relationship with a single maid becomes even deeper under the pretext of a master-servant relationship.

name: Shinkalion: Change the World
description:
"Unknown" is a mysterious enemy that suddenly appeared a long time ago. As a countermeasure, the "Evolutionary Railway Development Agency" (ERDA) has developed the "Shinkalion" robot that transform into bullet trains, to prepare for the threat.

"I want to be a cool person who can protect something..." Taisei Oonari, a second-year junior high school student, transfers to Shinkai Gakuen Middle School in search of clues about his older sister who disappeared two years ago.

Just then, the Unknown appears for the first time in 10 years. Taisei happens to have a high aptitude value as a Shinkalion pilot, and is forced to make a decision to fight it. What is the true nature of the Unknown and what is its purpose? What is the truth that comes to light at the end of the fight? The story of the boys' determination and growth begins now.

Can Hobin keep this up, or will he eventually meet his match?

However, at the end of the 500 million years, the person's loses that memory and returns to the point in time when they pushed the button. A person with this button appears in front of 5-year-old Tonio, 14-year-old Jaibi, and 17-year-old Suneko - three siblings who need money to pay for their father's hospital treatment.

Join the adventures of Dan Kouzo and the Misfit Clan as they partner with alien creatures called Bakugan in epic battles for the fate of the world! That's right, you read "alien creatures". Epic. name: Doukyo Suru Neneki
description:
Yuuji Fujiwara had an unlucky life. As a child, he was blamed for a vase he did not break, and he was fired from his job for a colleague's mistake. At the convenience store where he works part-time, Takamiya, a younger girl, blames him for mistakes made by others. When he returns home in a depressed mood, he is greeted by a strange girl. When Yuuji is puzzled, the girl reveals her true identity. It turns out to be a mucus creature that has been living with him for the past three months. The creature, which speaks human language and can change its shape at will, is in love with Yuuji. Yuuji is not at all pleased with the mucus creature's affection. In order to attract Yuuji's attention, the mucus creature changes its shape into Takamiya, the co-worker at his part-time job, and seduces him.

(Source: MediaBank, translated)

Always jealous of her friend, how pretty she is... her boyfriend... She will have it for herself one day...

That is until he meets the beautiful and charming caretaker, Mira, and he’s sold. The two begin to work together and their connection deepens. But Mira has a secret: she isn’t from this world!

Third-year Mirio Togata appears suddenly as the first-year students in Class A are bored during their ban from going outside. He brings with him the card game "Yuuei Heroes Battle," created by the support class. As each student picks cards and joins the fierce battle, there seems to be more to the game than meets the eye. At the end, who will emerge victorious?

(Source: Anime News Network)

Note: The anime had a world premiere at tne New York Comic Con event on October 13 in English dub before the Japanese release in theaters.

name: Wonderful Precure!

The 21st installment in the Precure series.

Animal Town is a town where animals and people live together. Iroha loves animals and is good friends with her dog, Komugi! One day, a mysterious creature, Garugaru, wreaks havoc in the town! However, in order to protect Iroha, Komugi transformed into human form and became a Precure...! I have to save the child animal whose heart is being garugaru-ed...! Let's join forces and return the animals to Niko Garden!

(Source: Crunchyroll News)

One, two, one, two, line up! Bow! Welcome! Hello, Doctor, I'm Beanstalk, and as of today, the Metal Crab Café is officially open for business in Rhodes Island, staffed by my adorable crew, including Rock, Hercules, and... Those three? You mean little Kay, Bubble, and Popukar? No, no, they're not staff, they're... Well, you'll find out when you come and have a cup of coffee!

Sequel to GREAT PRETENDER.

Presumed dead, master con artist and recovering amnesiac Dorothy is discovered by Shanghai Longu-bang, a mob who wants payback for her conning them. With no memories and nowhere to go, she must rely on a local crime underboss to elude Taipei’s criminal underworld all while tracking down leads to her mysterious past.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

Note: The movie was screened early in select American theaters on January 9, 2024.

name: Mahou Touki Lilustear
description:
Rin Himesato is a shy, plain, and ordinary girl who is bothered by the fact that her boobs are just a little bit bigger than others. On her way home one day, she is attacked by Hamelder, an evil organization that has infested the town. She is in a desperate situation! The one who rescued her was a friend of justice and a senior student at school, Sumire Hiyama, known as Frostia, a magical fighting princess. Rin learns of Frostia's true identity and can't help but worry about her as she fights. Frostia's predicament also ignites a flame of justice in Rin's heart! "I want to be a magic fighting princess......!" The story of a magical heroine of justice who fights against an evil organization begins! Roaring, Lilustear's Special Move!! Explosively erotic big breasts shake, plump thighs peek from the skirt. All the combatants who have ascended "twice" are in ecstasy!?

(Source: AniList)

name: Jin Zhan Fashi
description: Due to a mistake on his student’s part, a super Martial Artist received the wrong class in an online game and has become a mage. He, who was used to curbing violence with violence and using strength to subdue strength, could only make the best out of this mistake. Taking on a new lease in life, he became a violent close combat mage. When strength and magic came perfectly together, a new gaming path had been opened by him!

name: Qing Chi Hong Xiaodou Ba! 2nd Season
description: A daily of a cute red bean struggles to get eaten everyday.

name: Gekijou Tanpen Macross Frontier: Toki no Meikyuu
aliases: Gekijou Tanpen Macross Frontier: Toki no Meikyuu
description: Short screened with Macross Δ Movie 2: Zettai Live!!!.

name: Vampire Danshiryou
description:
Mito, who has no family to rely on, lives on the streets, disguised as a boy. Ruka, a vampire, saves her from a perilous situation and makes her an offer: become his subservient thrall from which he can feed whenever he wants, and she can live with him—in the boys' dorm. Because her very existence depends on her secret not being found out, every day is a new danger—to say nothing of that vampire! Meanwhile, Ruka, not knowing Mito's a girl, dotes on her night and day in an attempt to ripen her "disgusting male blood," but when real feelings develop... This dangerous romance between a crossdressing girl and an obsessive vampire begins!

(Source: Kodansha USA)

name: THE NEW GATE
description:
THE NEW GATE—an online game transformed into a life-and-death struggle for its players. Thanks to the valiant efforts of Shin, the most powerful of them all, an end to the game and freedom for everyone seemed within reach. But just moments after Shin defeats the game’s final boss, he finds himself bathed in an unknown light and transported some 500 years into the future of the in-game world. Thrown from a simple game gone wrong into a strange new land, one young swordsman of unrivalled strength is about to embark on a legendary journey!

(Source: One Peace Books)

name: Night Tail
description:
Based on the erotic doujin game by Circle Kurasuke Souko (さーくるくらすけ倉庫).

The creature that feasts on human memories and spirit, dream demons. The protagonist Night uses her power to battle these demons, and free people from their nightmares.

However, the one controlling the dream demons appears, and takes all of Night's friends, and everyone in her village away to her domain.

In order to bring everyone back, Night must battle those that control the dream demons, the "Wardens of Paradise"

(Source: DLsite English)

name: One Piece 4D
description: Original animation created as part of the Tokyo One Piece Tower theme park.

name: Denki 100%
description: A trip to Thailand unwinds across multiple channels of media during a casual bathhouse conversation between the filmmaker and Foodman, who also provided music.

name: Broter
description: When I was a kid, my big brother became obsessed with the 90s Japanese subculture of teenage guys who were known as "Gyaru-o." His odd appearance totally mystified me so I started to sneak into his room to look for his secrets.

name: Ghost Tale
description:
Su and Uh use the power of telekinesis to impress Lah by lifting up objects. Lah then tries to use telekinesis, too, but lacks this power, so Su and Uh help her.

(Source: Sonic Wiki Zone)

name: Issunboushi (2007)
description: A collaborative film between Keiichi Tanaami and Nobuhiro Aihara with a new interpretation of the traditional Japanese folk tale.

name: Kage-Jitsu! 2nd
aliases: The Eminence in Shadow Season 2 Mini Anime
Kage no Jitsuryokusha ni Naritakute! 2nd Season Mini Anime
description: The second season of Kage-Jitsu! mini animations, the shorts were initially broadcasted on television, then uploaded onto the KADOKAWA Anime YouTube channel.

name: Ple Ple Pleiades × Kage-Jitsu!
description: A collaboration anime between Overlord: Ple Ple Pleiades and Kegejitsu!

name: Blue Eye Samurai
description:
Driven by a dream of revenge against those who made her an outcast in Edo-period Japan, a young warrior cuts a bloody path toward her destiny.

(Source: Netflix)

name: Washimo 9th Season
description: Ninth season of the Washimo series.

name: Washimo 8th Season
description: Eighth season of the Washimo series.

name: Washimo 7th Season
description: Seventh season of the Washimo series.

name: A4 Microcosm
description:
Microorganisms propagate, gather, and transform into an A4 sheet of paper. You can feel signs of life within the page.

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Nezumi to Prism
description:
The mouse finds a prism and it reveals to him a magnificent rainbow like he’s never seen before. He tries to show his friends but for some reason it won’t reappear. It seems beauty has a mind of its own.

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Jinxiu Shenzhou Zhi Qi You Ji 2
description: Continuation of Jinxiu Shenzhou Zhi Qi You Ji

name: Hen Xi You 2
description: Second season of Hen Xi You

name: Xiuluo Wu Shen
description: One night a mysterious and unexplained phenomenon occurs in the nine provinces. Five years later Chu Feng, a regular outer disciple of the Azure Dragon school, awakens one of the mysterious nine lightning beasts. And discovers an egg sealed inside him.

name: Xian Ni
description:
Wang Lin is a very smart boy with loving parents. Although he and his parents are shunned by the rest of their relatives, his parents have always held high hopes that he will one day achieve greatness. One day, Wang Lin suddenly gained the chance to walk the path of an immortal but found that he only had mediocre talent at best. Watch Wang Lin as he breaks through his lack of talent and walks the path towards becoming a real immortal!

(Source: Xian Ni Wiki)

name: Emo Faze
description:
Duwei is born into this new world from Earth without a sound, he does not cry, he simply stares at the people around him. As he grows he does not speak and curses this new world he was forced into.
His Father a Great General is sure there must be something he has an aptitude for, however he is simply trash. Disregarded by his family as the Retarded heir.
This is the story of his journey to discover the truths of this world and use the knowledge of his past life to remove his title of retard, even if he has to become a devil.

name: Moffun to Issho
description:
This series is about the cryptid hunter, Panpy. He goes out searching for a legendary yeti in the snowy mountains. There he meets the yeti, Moffun, who takes him to the Mofu Village. The story revolves around Panpy's adventures with Moffun in the village.

A spin-off to the Ousama Sentai King-Ohger TV series, this series portrays the TV show "Moffun to Issho", a popular anime within the world of the King-Ohger TV series. These shorts were originally released on the Toei Tokusatsu Fanclub (TTFC) app.

name: Wushen Zhuzai: Da Wei Pian
description: The second season of Wushen Zhuzai.

name: Nioi ga Suru
description:
The world is filled with smells — good smells, nasty smells, nasty but good smells, addictive smells, captivating smells, reminiscent smells, and so many more. What’s that smell?

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Umiushi
description:
Two brothers are drawing pictures in art class, but they see completely different things. The younger one is confused by the behavior of his brother, who is lost in his own world. But then, his big brother shares his beautiful world of gentle sea creatures.

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Sora Tobu Hae mo Hoshi no You
aliases: Out of Sight, Out of Mind
Sora Tobu Hae mo Hoshi no You
description:
SOS… SOS… A black and white TV falls in love with the girl sending out the distress signal. He rushes up the mountain of trash and off to the moon he goes where the crying girl awaits. If only she could see him beyond the screen.

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Time Autobahn
description:
A speeding car leaps onto the highway of Time and hurtles forward — its velocity is limitless.

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Watashi ru-ru
description:
A girl heading home from school is met with a bigger version of herself who poses arbitrary challenges with unspeakable consequences. The little girl tries to keep up but suddenly the stakes are raised.

(Source: Geidai Animation

name: Ahita Kara
description:
We go to sleep in hopes for a better tomorrow. The moment of truth nears as our eyes slowly open to the new day…

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: A DOG
description:
Once upon a time, a man killed the king’s pet dog. He was executed and reincarnated as a canis but with the memory of his past life as a man.

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Strangers in the Alley
description:
Deep down the alley the black cat has entered is a town where nonhuman beings live in peace. The cat returns to his home to rest when suddenly he hears a strange sound coming from next door.

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Zero Sugar Saero CM
description: Lotte Chilsung's Soju Saero commercial featuring Dohyun Lee.

name: Monk SEISHIN
description: In the 19th century, a rice merchant encounters a mother who tries to buy rice in exchange for her own child's clothes. The merchant becomes Monk Seishin and relieves the islanders of Miyajima from poverty by digging wells and starting the wooden ladle industry.

name: Shinigami Bocchan to Kuro Maid 3rd Season
aliases: The Duke of Death and His Maid Season 3
Shinigami Bocchan to Kuro Maid 3rd Season
description: The third season of Shinigami Bocchan to Kuro Maid.

name: Gekkan Mousou Kagaku
description:
Delusional Monthly Magazine is set in Most City in an unknown country in a small publishing house that prints a monthly magazine about the most outlandish of things. Everything changes when the staff of the magazine, editor-in-chief Taro, his assistant Jiro and dog Saburo, meet with scientist Goro Sato…

(Source: Crunchyroll News)

name: Odekake Kozame × GAMERA -Rebirth-
description: Special episode of Odekake Kozame promoting GAMERA -Rebirth-.

name: The Big Tree in Front of the House
aliases: The Big Tree in Front of the House
description:
It should have been an ordinary day, but it was very different from usual. There was a large crowd in front of my grandma’s house. Where did people come from and where are they going? I was peeping at them behind the window, but the big tree obstructed my view.

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Our house / Notre maison
description:
Alice goes alone. She opens the doors like she let her legs do the leading and she finds various houses by various people. This work expresses the landscape or the figure of love that we’re keen from the bottoms of our hearts, with(using) various images and motifs.

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: I Am a Motif
description:
There are three “Motifs”. The complete differences between them make themselves self-doubt. The melody begins, and the music motif could not resist the impulse to dance, but the others also catching up … Am “I” also a “Motif”? This film uses a Fugue from Bach, tries to unify similar concepts that exist in different forms, including music, visual arts, and narrative.

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Re:Monster
description:
After meeting an untimely death, Tomokui Kanata is reincarnated as a lowly goblin, but he’s worked up a monstrous appetite. Thanks to his new ability that allows him to grow stronger the more he feeds, his feeble status quickly changes, and he rises to become the goblin leader. With a mix of his past memories, new body, and a strong stomach, he’s taking a bite out of this new fantastical world!

(Source: Crunchyroll, edted)

The episodes were streamed several days ahead of the TV broadcast on U-NEXT, Anime Houdai, and Crunchyroll beginning on April 2nd, 2024 at 0:00 JST. The regular TV broadcast begins on April 5th, 2024.

name: Hisui Kobanashi
aliases: Pokémon Kids TV: Hisuian Voltorb is Berry Sorry
description: Stop-motion shorts featuring Hisui-form Biriridama, made to promote the upcoming release of the Pokémon LEGENDS Arceus game.

name: Xue Wang Jiadao
description:
The ice cream scepter was mysteriously stolen. In order to regain the scepter and save the ice continent, Snow King chased the scepter thief all the way to Hunting Valley, and accidentally met the bounty hunter "Boss Rabbit" whose dream is to make money to revitalize the restaurant. In this way, with their own goals, the two started a fun adventure to find the scepter together.

(Source: iqiyi.com, translated)

name: The On-hold Music of Terror
description:
"You're right. There was a bug–I killed it." Late at night, only one voice wafts around the room. What lies on the other end of the telephone line is anyone's guess...

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Woke
description:
Right there in that little gap between fantasy and reality, me and you, movies and videos, concrete and abstract, is that nice cozy space.

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: My Hand, Her Hand
description: The little girl has a complex because she doesn’t look like her mom, and the mom wants her daughter to look more ladylike. Their faces don’t look alike, but their hands do. The girl treasures this resemblance, which also enables the mom to treat her daughter with tenderness.

name: The depths of us
description:
My older brother and I became separated on a mountain crawling with eerie insects. I was taught that family should stay together no matter what, so I climbed deep into the mountain in search of my brother.

(Source: Geidai Animation)

name: Yongzhe Donghua Xilie
description: In a world full of discrimination and hatred, stereotype is no longer what it really is. The braves believe that only when the evil is defeated, will the world comes with peace. Yet the braves realize that they are not standing on the side of justice.

name: BURN THE WITCH #0.8
aliases: BURN THE WITCH ZERO POINT EIGHT
description:
"Dragons"... from ancient times, they were considered fictional creatures, but they're not actually fictional, nor are they technically creatures. They are heteromorphic beings, and many of the deaths in London can be attributed to them. But most citizens in London don't know what dragons look like or know they even exist. Only those who live in Reverse London can see them. In Reverse London, there was an agency called Wing Bind (WB for short) that was in charge of protecting and managing the dragons. And there were two witches who belonged to Wing Bind...

(Source: Crunchyroll)

name: Gummies
description: A station ID by Kanta Mochida for MTV ULTRAHITS.

name: Stray Sheep
description: Stray Sheep station identifications for Fuji TV's JOCX-MIDNIGHT timeslot.

name: so_low
description:
I definitely don't need to.... but wouldn't doing it just one more time feel really nice?

(Source: Hanime)

name: "Inochi Sketch" Movie Jabow x Mameshiba Collab CM
aliases: "Inochi Sketch" Movie Jabow x Mameshiba Collab CM
description: Special animation between Mameshiba and Inochi Sketch to promote the movie.

name: Tarbosaurus, The Mightiest Ever
description: Tarbosaurus: The Mightiest Ever is a South Korean adventure drama film directed by Han Sang-Ho. A spiritual prequel to The Dino King, sharing various themes with the movie and also being directed by Han Sang-Ho, this film follows the life of a Tarbosaurus family made up of Patch, (the father of Speckles from The Dino King), his two siblings and their mother in prehistoric South Korea.

name: Detective Conan Manner Movie
description:
Manner movie featuring Conan and Camera Man, a character from "NO MORE Eiga Dorobou" campaign.

Released on extra DVD for Detective Conan Movie 19: The Hellfire Sunflowers.

name: Shiguang Dailiren x realme: Shenmi Q Xiansheng de Weituo
aliases: Link Click x realme: Shenmi Q Xiansheng de Weituo
description: A collaboration between the anime Link Click, and the Chinese smartphone company realme, to advertise the Q5 Pro Android smartphone.

name: FIFA
description: Football stars from all over the world pass the ball to each other and finally get together to celebrate the Chinese New Year.

name: Pokémon: Path to the Peak
description: After moving and needing to attend a new school, Ava has trouble finding new friends. However, she learns about and joins the school's Pokémon Club, where the members are avid players of the Pokémon Trading Card Game.

name: Anhe Zhuan
aliases: Shaonian Gexing Wai Chuan: Anhe Chuan
description:
Anhe, the most mysterious killer organization in the world, is composed of the three surnames Su, Xie, and Mu. Everyone was poisoned, and their lives were at stake. After learning the news, the three forces of the Anhe River took the opportunity to launch a rebellion. Su Muyu, as the leader of Spider Shadow's guard group, brought in Bai Hehuai, the genius doctor of Medicine King Valley, to heal the elders, while repelling the killers and protecting the elder Zhouquan. At this time, his friend Su Changhe in Anhe, but on behalf of the Su family joined the operation to assassinate the patriarch.

(Source: Youku, translated)

name: Xi Xing Ji: Nian Fan
description: The fifth season of Xixing Ji.

name: Jeombagi Hanbandoui Gongnyong 2: Saeroun Nagwon
aliases: Dino King: Journey to Fire Mountain
Speckles the Tarbosaurus 2: The New Paradise
Dinosaurs on the Spotted Korean Peninsula 2: A New Paradise
description: Speckles the tarbosaurus embarks on a journey to the ends of the earth in search for his young son Junior who was kidnapped during a dangerous encounter.

name: Jii-san Baa-san Wakagaeru
aliases: Grandpa and Grandma Turn Young Again
A Story About a Grandpa and Grandma Who Returned Back to Their Youth
おじいさんとおばあさんが若返った話。
Ojiisan to Obaasan ga Wakagaetta Hanashi.
description:
The story of Jii-san Baa-san Wakagaeru follows Shouzou and Ine, an elderly couple who are living a quiet life in a farming village in Aomori Prefecture. After eating a mysterious apple that they discover on their apple farm, Shozo and Ine spontaneously regain their youth, but even after being reinvigorated they continue to live life at a grandparent-ly pace.

(Source: Crunchyroll News, edited)

name: Kunoichi Ryoujokuden Ajisai
description:
Based on the erotic doujin game by Midnight Pleasure (ミッドナイトプレジャー).

Ajisai infiltrated the quarters of a powerful clan in search of missing girls. When she found a ring of drug dealers and human sex traffickers, all signs pointed to kidnapping as well.

(Source: AniList)

name: Houkago no Breath
description:
A limited original series based in the Paldea region, the setting of the Pokémon Scarlet and Pokémon Violet games.

Houkago no Breath follows three academy students—Ohara, Aliquis, and Houma—on their journey of growth and learning while attending school.

(Source: The Pokémon Company International, edited)

name: Fudanshi Shoukan: Isekai de Shinjuu ni Hameraremashita Mini Anime Tokubetsu-hen
aliases: Fudanshi Shoukan: Isekai de Shinjuu ni Hameraremashita Mini Anime Tokubetsu-hen
description: A special short chibi animation announcing the production of a Drama CD for the series.

aliases: Fudanshi Shoukan: Isekai de Shinjuu ni Hameraremashita Mini Anime 5th Season
Fudanshi Shoukan: Isekai de Shinjuu ni Hameraremashita 5th Season
腐男子召喚〜異世界で神獣にハメられました〜 5th

description: Third season of Fudanshi Shoukan: Isekai de Shinjuu ni Hameraremashita.

aliases: Fudanshi Shoukan: Isekai de Shinjuu ni Hameraremashita Mini Anime 2nd Season
Fudanshi Shoukan: Isekai de Shinjuu ni Hameraremashita 2nd Season
腐男子召喚〜異世界で神獣にハメられました〜 2nd
description: The second season of Fudanshi Shoukan: Isekai de Shinjuu ni Hameraremashita.

name: Fudanshi Shoukan: Isekai de Shinjuu ni Hameraremashita Mini Anime
aliases: Fudanshi Summoning: I Got Laid by a Divine Beast on an Alternate World
Fudanshi Shoukan: Isekai de Shinjuu ni Hameraremashita Mini Anime
Fudanshi Shoukan: Isekai de Shinjuu ni Hameraremashita
腐男子召喚〜異世界で神獣にハメられました〜
description:
A short anime commemorating the release of the BL manga's second volume.

Kotone is a fudanshi. One day while he was buying BL manga outside of a manga stand, a truck loses control and kills him with BL manga all over him. To his surprise, he wakes up in an Asian ancient-looking palace. A man named Nagi, that is half serpent, tells him that he is now his Miko. They need to have sex in order for Nagi to become a higher being and become a Dragon. Kotone knows everything about BL and he realizes that he will be the bottom. Kotone will use his knowledge of BL to not fall in love and not a bottom in this Isekai world.

(Source: AniList)

name: Shen Lan Qi Yu Wushuang Zhu: Tianmo Pian - Ding Dang
description: Third season of Shen Lan Qi Yu Wushuang Zhu: Tianmo Pian.

name: Yuanshen: Hai Dengjie CM Duanpian - Ming Xiao Huanmeng
aliases: Genshin Impact: Lantern Rite PV - Dream Upon a Lantern
Yuanshen: Hai Dengjie CM Duanpian - Ming Xiao Huanmeng
description: Animated commercial promoting the release of the 2023 Lantern Rite update for Genshin Impact.

name: Mayi
description: Ordinary people, nightmares in the evening…

name: Chiichai! Maou-sama!!
aliases: The Devil is a Part-Timer! Season 2 Mini Anime
description: Chibi anime for Hataraku Maou-sama!! released on Twitter and YouTube.

name: Watashi no Shiawase na Katachi OVA
aliases: Watashi no Shiawase na Katachi OVA
description: An unaired episode bundled with the special edition of the 8th Watashi no Shiawase na Kekkon light novel volume.

name: Tonari no Yōkai-san
description:
"Our cat might be turning into a nekomata..." A rural town where youkai, people and gods live normal, everyday lives, mixed with a bit of warmth and occasional mystery.

One summer, the twenty-year old cat Buchio suddenly evolves into a nekomata. Questioning the reason for his evolution, he sets out to learn more about transformation, together with the transforming kitsune Yuri.

Muu-chan spies on the crow Tengu Jirou as he performs his Tengu duties, and begins to see Jirou in a new light. At that same time, rumors of an unfortunate Nue begin to spread…

(Source: East Press, translated)

name: G.R.M.
aliases: G.R.M.: The Record Of Garm War
description:
Armored beings called "Garm" engage the formless monsters called "SEAL" who are destroying the planet "ANNWN".

Pilot film for Mamoru Oshii's G.R.M. project that would later be turned into movie "The Last Druid: Garm Wars".

name: Bio-Sensor
description: Bio-Sensor is a 1984 Japanese computer-animated surreal short film produced by Takashi Fukumoto at Toyo Links and Hitoshi Nishimura at Osaka University. It's notable for its early use of primitive motion capture, using profile and head-on films of a tiger walking.

name: holoAdvent
description: Series of short teasers for the debut of HololiveEN's 3rd Gen.

name: Chang Jian Feng Yun 2nd Season
aliases: Long Sword, Wind and Cloud 2nd Season
description: Second season of Chang Jian Feng Yun.

name: Pokémon WCS2023
description: Promotional Video made in celebration of the 2023 Pokémon World Championship.

name: In An Alternate Universe...
description: Short lore animation to celibrate Takanashi Kiara's new outfit.

name: 3-gatsu no Lion: Ugoku! Nya Shogi
aliases: Ugoku! Nyaa Shougi: Nikaidou-sensei no Mocchiri Shougi Kyoushitsu
description: A 10 episode special teaching each piece of shogi.

name: Otome Game no Hametsu Flag shika Nai Akuyaku Reijou ni Tensei shiteshimatta... Voice Drama
aliases: My Next Life as a Villainess: All Routes Lead to Doom! Voice Drama
Otome Game no Hametsu Flag shika Nai Akuyaku Reijou ni Tensei shiteshimatta... Voice Drama
description: Recap voice dramas of main characters posted online and later included in Blu-ray volume 2 of main series.

name: MONSTERS: Ippaku Sanjou Hiryuu Jigoku
description:
MONSTERS: 103 Mercies Dragon Damnation by Eiichiro Oda tells the tale of Ryuuma, the legendary swordsman that hails from the Land of Wano in One Piece.

(Source: Netflix Anime, edited)

name: Fuuga no Gihou
description: The first CG animated film produced in Japan. It premiered at the first Sogetsu Experimental Film Festival and was made by students Gaku Yamada and Yoshio Tsukio from the Department of Urban Engineering at The University of Tokyo.

name: Xue Ying Lingzhu 3
description: The third season of Xue Ying Lingzhu.

name: Long Wang Dian 2nd Season
description: The second season of Fake Identity

name: Locomotor
description:
Half man, half steam engine. Full speed ahead, regardless.

Isaku Kaneko's 1st year work 2018 at Tama Art University.

name: Dooppel!
description: A short film by Hideki Nakagawa.

name: Koneko no Haitatsuin Uunyan
description:
Unyan, a kitten from Cat Island, is very excited about his first delivery job! However, while he is distracted by the flying soap bubbles and eating the candy he receives, he loses his delivery bag. Unyan finds the bag and chases after it as hard as he can...!

This is a heartwarming story about "the interaction between a small child and the adults who watch over him.

(Source: YouTube Description)

name: Zhen Hun Jie 3
aliases: 镇魂街 风花雪月篇
description: The third season of Zhen Hun Jie.

name: Splash Party!
description: Animated trailer for the 3D Live Splash Party! released as part of Hololive Summer 2023.

name: Kizuna no Allele Season 2
description: The second season of Kizuna no Allele.

name: MASHLE Kami Shinkakusha Kouho Senbatsu Shiken-hen
aliases: MASHLE Kami Shinkakusha Kouho Senbatsu Shiken-hen
Mashle: Divine Visionary Selection Exam Arc
Mashle: Magic and Muscles - The Divine Visionary Candidate Exam Arc.
description: The second season of MASHLE, adapting the Divine Visionary Candidate Exam Arc.

name: 5-ten no Watashi
description: Graduation work of Ayumi Daito at Tama Art University.

name: Onaka no ka Ichi Yuusan
description: Graduation work of Feiran Cao at Tama Art University.

name: Kimberly Mahou Gakkou no Yukai na Nichijou
aliases: Kimberly Mahou Gakkou no Yukai na Nichijou
Kimberly Mahō Gakkō no Yukai na Nichijō
description: Reign of the Seven Spellblades mini anime released online.

name: Okashi na Tensei Mini Anime
description: Okashi na Tensei mini anime released online for ten consecutive days prior to the main series.

name: Journey to the Bosei no Mezame
aliases: Journey to the Bosei no Mezame
description: When I was 14 years old, I suddenly awaked maternal while attending junior high school at one morning. Ten years after trapped in maternal, I began to doubt this feeling if it was maternal. Virgin birth, genes, pregnancy ... I travel 10 years to explore motherhood.

aliases: Kumo no Hito Ame no Hito

A short film by Joukou Tomoyoshi

Story on the sky. Above the cloud, there exist a cloud person and a rain person. Story of the meeting of two people.

name: Himesama "Goumon" no Jikan desu
description:
As the war between the Imperial Army and Hellhorde rages on, the Princess, despite being armed with her mythical sword Excalibur, is captured and imprisoned. What kind of torture does she face at the hands of the chief demon interrogator? Fluffy fresh-baked toast! Hot, steaming ramen! Oh, the humanity! Can the Princess withstand these tormenting treats and keep her kingdom’s secrets safe?

(Source: Crunchyroll)

name: Guomin Laogong Dai Huijia 4
description: The fourth season of Guomin Laogong Dai Hujia

name: Yong Sheng: Shi Nian Zhi Yue
description:
In the majestic fantasy world, how does the protagonist Fang Han traverse the world with his own strength. Relying on an unyielding stubbornness to break through the mysteries of supernatural powers, and forge the physical body into an immortal body. There are endless novel magic weapons, and the brand-new prosperity of the Three Realms of Immortals, Demons and Fans will be opened by the protagonist in turn. It will take you to experience the fantasy demeanor of the immortal sect, demons, gods, kings and emperors. The protagonist will also experience the love and hatred in the world, the entanglement of grievances and resentments, and the disputes between immortals and demons. Finally lead you on the road to the top king.

(Source: bilibili)

name: Mahoutsukai no Yome SEASON 2 Part 2
aliases: The Ancient Magus' Bride Season 2 Part 2
description:
The second cour of Mahoutsukai no Yome SEASON 2.

More magical adventures await Elias, Chise, and all of her new friends at the College. Just how strong will Chise’s magic grow?

(Source: Crunchyroll News)

description: An experimental film by Tarafu Otani about hands.

name: One Piece: Dai Gekisen Tokushuu! Mugiwara no Ichimi vs. Tobi Roppou
aliases: One Piece: Recapping Fierce Fights! Straw Hats vs. Tobi Roppo
One Piece: Dai Gekisen Tokushuu! Mugiwara no Ichimi vs. Tobi Roppou
description:
This is the 6th recap special of the Wano arc. 

Zoro and Sanji look back on their friends’ battles against the Tobi Roppo, the top officers of the Animal Kingdom Pirates.

name: Mamekichi Mameko NEET no Nichijou 2
aliases: Mameko Mamekichi's NEET Everyday Life Season 2
description: The second season of Mamekichi Mameko NEET no Nichijou.

name: Sword Art Online: FULLDIVE - Opening Eizou
aliases: Sword Art Online: FULLDIVE - Opening Eizou
description:
Opening video for the "Sword Art Online -FULLDIVE-" event which took place at the Tokyo Garden Theater. This memorial event was to celebrate 10 years of the Sword Art Online anime, with an original story by Reki Kawahara performed by the anime's seiyuus via live voice drama and musical guest performances by artists involved with the anime's music throughout the decade.

The animation shows the main characters of the Aincrad Arc right before they put on the Nerv Gear and begin their fateful adventure in the Sword Art Online game.

(Source: Anime News Network, edited)

Note: Coincidentally, the release date of this video lines up with the fictional date of when the servers of the Sword Art Online game launched in-universe.

name: I.CINNAMOROLL
description: A new short series of I.CINNAMOROLL airing in October

name: Douluo Dalu 2: Jueshi Tangmen
aliases: Soul Land 2: The Unrivaled Tang Sect
description:
The Tang Sect in a turbulent world. There is nothing but martial spirit here. Ten thousand years after the founding of the Tang Sect, it is in relative decline. An extremely talented man was born. Can the new Shrek Seven Monsters revive the Tang Sect and bring it back to glory? A soul beast of over one million years old; Electrolux who can pick stars; The new soul utensil system that led to the decline of the Tang Sect... A lot of secrets are to be revealed. Can the secret weapons of the Tang Sect be sharp again? Can the Tang Sect regain its former glory?

(Source: WeTV)

aliases: Fate/Grand Order: Fujimaru Ritsuka Doesn't Get It - Year-End Special
Fate/Grand Order: Fujimaru Ritsuka wa Wakaranai - Nenmatsu Special
Fate/Grand Order: Fujimaru Ritsuka wa Wakaranai Episode 0
description:
Ritsuka Fujimaru—humanity's last master. It would not have been possible to restore humanity without him. However, he does have a shortcoming... he is far too honest! A slapstick comedy in which Fujimaru's simple questions sway the heroic spirits!

(Source: MAL)

name: Xiao Li yu Hupo
aliases: The Koi Fish in love with the Cat Fairy
description:
A 1000-year old magical carp Xiao Li (taking the form of a human girl) is caught by a magic cat Hupo (in the form of a human boy). Xiao Li convinces Hupo not to eat her, and they form a friendship and do random slice of life things together.

(Source: MAL)

aliases: Little Bell and Ami's Love Story

description: Gravity Falls shorts focused on Mabel.

name: Gravity Falls Pilot
description: Pilot for the series Gravity Falls.

description: The pilot for Tiger Mask included with the DVD release of the series.

name: Gravity Falls Season 2
description: Twin brother and sister Dipper and Mabel Pines are in for an unexpected adventure when they spend the summer helping their great uncle Stan run a tourist trap in the mysterious town of Gravity Falls, Oregon.

name: Gravity Falls
description: Twin brother and sister Dipper and Mabel Pines are in for an unexpected adventure when they spend the summer helping their great uncle Stan run a tourist trap in the mysterious town of Gravity Falls, Oregon.

name: Tenchi Muyou! GXP: Paradise Shidou-hen
aliases: Tenchi Muyo! GXP Paradise Beginnings Arc
description:
2022 marks the 30th anniversary of the original Tenchi Muyo! Ryo-Ohki OVA series and to celebrate, a brand new Tenchi Muyo! GXP anime series was announced.

The new series, titled Tenchi Muyo! GXP Paradise Beginnings Arc, connects the 4th and 5th seasons of the series and will serve as an introduction to the Paradise War through the eyes of Seina Yamada.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

name: Kanjigram
description:
A video work inspired by the "meaning, form and origin" of kanji, reinterpreted and archived using the technique of stop-motion animation. A project that began with the realization that it is the "likeness" drawn out by the imagination that is the essence of kanji.

(Source: Official Site)

name: Odekake Kozame
description:
The story follows a little shark character, Kozame-chan's adventures in Yauo town, which smells "nostalgic." From radio exercises to festival stalls to meeting with friends, Kozame-chan has a variety of heartwarming experiences in the town.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

name: Shuumatsu no Valkyrie II Part 2
description: The second part of Shuumatsu no Valkyrie II.

name: Black Myth: Wukong Short Film
description: A stop-motion short film created in celebration of Chinese New Year by developer, Game Science with the announcement of the studio's Black Myth: Wukong video game release.

name: Mortal Kombat Legends: Snow Blind
description:
As Kano and the Black Dragon wreak havoc around the globe, a young warrior named Kenshi will have to rise above his own limitations and take on the looming threat of Outworld.

(Source: IMDB)

name: Mortal Kombat Legends: Battle of the Realms
aliases: Mortal Kombat Legends: Battle of the Realms
description:
The Earthrealm heroes must journey to Outworld and fight for the survival of their homeland, invaded by the forces of evil warlord Shao Kahn, in the tournament to end all tournaments: the final Mortal Kombat.

(Source: IMDB)

name: Mortal Kombat Legends: Scorpion's Revenge
description:
Hanzo Hasashi loses his family during an attack by a rival clan the Lin Kuei. He is given the chance to compete in an inter-dimensional tournament to save his loved ones while other fighters try to save the Earth realm from annihilation.

(Source: IMDB)

name: Jian Xian Zai Ci
description:
Lin Beichen, an otaku, got a mobile phone by coincidence, and the mobile phone took him into a world called Dongdong Zhenzhou. Here, he became the first son of Lin Jinnan, one of the top ten famous men in the North Sea Empire [Zhantianhou]. He was also a notorious black sheep, and was born with brain disease. When Hou Lin was defeated in the south during the war, his family was in decline, and Lin Beichen, who lost his backer, was stuck in school by various' enemies' and couldn't go out. In a critical moment, he was surprised to find that the mobile phone he brought with him turned out to be a plug-in artifact that could help him practise. Relying on this artifact, Lin Beichen opened his own way of hilarious counterattack.

(Source: iQIYI)

name: Mashle: Mash Burnedead to Fushigi na Tegami
aliases: Mashle: Magic and Muscles - Mash Burnedead and the Mysterious Letter
Mashle: Mash Burnedead to Fushigi na Tegami
description: Recap of the first six episodes of Mashle.

name: Kono Sekai no Tanoshimikata: Secret Story Film
aliases: How to Enjoy This World: Secret Story Film
Kono Sekai no Tanoshimikata: Secret Story Film
description:
An animated movie project announced to commemorate HoneyWorks' 10th anniversary.

The movie will center around the story behind male idol unit LIPxLIP, and its members Yujiro and Aizo.

name: Beyblade Burst QuadStrike
description:
The stage is set for a masquerade tournament, but the Dark Prince isn’t the only belle at this ball! Enter: the masked Blader known as ‘Quadra’. Wielding her elemental Bey, Lightning Pandora, Quadra has defeated every foe to come her way. Meanwhile, Quadra’s brother, Pax, is busy studying the elemental powers radiating from a series of mysterious ruins nearby. Bel might be the Dark Prince, but this adventure is full of even darker secrets!

(Source: BEYBLADE BURST Official)

description: Manabu Himeda's graduation work from 2012 at Tama Art University.

name: Yume Mitsuya
description: One fateful night, a faithful fan has a chance encounter with the one and only Chouzetsu Saikawa Tenshi-chan...

name: Three Pictures
description: Short animation by Zhang Lihong

name: Friend2
description: Short animation by Gan Wang

name: Ni Zhenshi Ge Tiancai
description:
In another world, there are two continents, east and west. The northern part of the Western Continent lives with the mysterious Snow Mountain tribe, while the southern part is occupied by the prosperous Daqin Empire. Magic is the source of energy in the world. The Daqin Empire relied on the power of magic to defeat countless enemies and disasters, and established a prosperous civilized world. A boy from a tribe with a forbidden demon physique from the north started a journey of magic cultivation in the southern continent full of magic power.

Bai Xiao, the son of the Snow Mountain tribe, was forced to separate from his girlfriend Qingyue in order to unravel the curse of her. However, the alien world that is thousands of miles apart and the amnesia of his girlfriend couldn't stop Bai Xiao's footsteps. He set foot on the southern continent alone with countless treasures, and started the journey to find his lover. The man destined to become a genius shocked the entire empire with his astonishing talent and extraordinary audacity. Where will his magical path of cultivation go? Can he win Qingyue's heart again?

(Source: Bilibili)

name: San Cun Renjian
description:
In a different world with strong spiritual energy, Wang Baole, a warm and cheerful little fat man, saw through the illusion created by the teachers in the entrance examination of the famous school "Dragon Taoist Academy", and won high scores with his excellent performance, and obtained the "Magic Department". The quota of specially recruited students has since overcame obstacles and opened up his own way of upgrading. In the process of cultivating immortals and fighting monsters, he made a large number of close friends, and thus started a series of hilarious adventure stories.

(Source: bilibili)

name: Kokuhaku...
description:
She thought she was safe with a teacher, but little did she know that he was the biggest threat!

(Source: H-Anime)

name: VINLAND SAGA SEASON 2: Same old story
aliases: VINLAND SAGA SEASON 2: Same old story
VINLAND SAGA SEASON 2 Episode 18.5 "Same old story"
ヴィンランド・サガ SEASON2 第18.5話 "Same old story"
description:
Episode 18.5 of VINLAND SAGA SEASON 2.

Additional clip of Ketil commanding the farm's warriors that leads in to episode 19.

(Source: Official Vinland Saga Twitter account, edited)

name: Petit Clover Advance
description: Petit Clover Specials included in the Black Clover Blu-Ray Volumes.

name: Shijian Qiutu Zhi Miwu
description: Second season of Shijian Qiutu.

name: Tuanzimen De Shiming
description:
These little Budding Pops don't know why they are here, but they are happy to have the star fruit and to be fed together every day. Until one day, a special little one awakens in this star land. Tired of the daily deception and battle of wits with others, he wants to find companions who are like him and can love each other! However, change always comes more suddenly than expected...

(Source: Official YouTube Channel)

name: Zhe Tian
description:
The story took the nine dragons and the coffin as an introduction and brought out a huge world of primeval ages. Climbing the sky road, and singing songs, to see how Ye Fan shrouding the heavens.

(Source: Webnovel)

name: Abeojiuibang
description:
She was abused by her father during childhood. Since he left, the pain and anger had begun to fade. One day, unexpectedly, she was struck by a revelation about her father's life that cast her feelings about him into confusion.

(Source: Vimeo)

name: BASTIONS
description:
These unconventional heroes are gearing up to prevent disaster! In a world where superpowers are the norm, a group of beloved idols work together to keep society safe. But they're about to face a new enemy: Wash Green. This megacorporation may call itself eco-friendly, but it's really the leader in environmental pollution. Can Bastions persevere and save the planet?

(Source: ANN)

name: Katarina Nounai Kaigi X
description: Short posted on the official twitter account where the "Katarina Five" introduces My Next Life as a Villainess: All Routes Lead to Doom! X.

name: Katarina Nounai Kaigi
description: A series of chibi shorts posted on the HameHura twitter introducing the anime.

name: Detective Conan: TDK Video Head Cleaner
aliases: Detective Conan: TDK Video Head Cleaner
description: Video head cleaning in VCR players explained by characters from Detective Conan series.

name: Yuzuki-san Chi no Yon Kyoudai.
description: The Yuzuki family consists of four brothers: Hayato, Mikoto, Minato, and Gakuto. The eldest son, Hayato, happily lives every day to the fullest. There are tears, laughter and excitement at home, at school, and in the neighborhood!

name: Pi Zhe Lang Pi De Yang
description:
There exists a website where you just pay a few dollars and set a keyword, then you can easily enter the world of novels to personally run around and venture. After every time you enter, the experiences that occurred will automatically become parts of the novels. A new novelist, Lan Pi, saw such an introduction, mouse-clicked it, closed her eyes, and entered the VR world. The funny love between the gentle, black-hearted Sheep King and the funny, straightforward Wolf tomboy girl has just begun.

(Source: Kuaikan Manhua, translated)

name: Ququ Bucai, Zaixia Yeguai
aliases: 怎么办! 我穿越成了最弱小野怪
Zenmeban! Wo Chuanyue Cheng Le Zui Ruoxiao Ye Guai
What To Do! I Have Become The Weakest Little Monster
description:
“Azure" is a popular online game that has been active for ten years running. I'm a veteran who's been playing since launch, and I got a huge prize! After opening the gift... I was transmigrated into the game as the weakest little monster!

(Source: Bilibili Comics)

name: Shousetsu "Tokimori-tachi no Last Dance" "Tanabata no Yoru ni Okaeri" PV
aliases: Shousetsu "Tokimori-tachi no Last Dance" "Tanabata no Yoru ni Okaeri" PV
description: Animated commercial directed by Naoki Miyahara promoting the release of the novels Tokimori-tachi no Last Dance and Tanabata no Yoru ni Okaeri that take place after the Pop in Q movie. The PV features the song Otogibanashi by Yuuki Tsujimura feat. Asami Seto.

name: Hitori de Honkaku-teki ni Komadori Anime Tsukuttemita
aliases: I Made a Full-Fledged Stop-Motion Animation by Myself
Hitori de Honkaku-teki ni Komadori Anime Tsukuttemita
I Made a Real Time-Lapse Animation by Myself
description:
A magical girl who has become a villain and an Aquapazza army that plans to conquer the stars!
They fight against the hero of justice, Majin Sentai Death Ranger, and gradually gain control in various ways.

name: Kakkou no Iikagen!
aliases: カッコウの許嫁 ミニアニメ
description: Mini animations featuring the characters from Kakkou no Iinazuke anime posted on the KADOKAWA Anime YouTube channel and the official Cuckoo Anime Twitter account.

name: Kyokou Suiri Mini Anime Season 2
description: Short episodes with super-deformed characters posted on the official Twitter account.

name: Girls Band Cry
description:
The main character drops out of high school in her second year, and aims at entering a university while working alone in Tokyo. A girl is betrayed by her friends and doesn't know what to do. Another girl is abandoned by her parents, and tries to survive in the city by doing part-time jobs.

This world lets us down all the time. Nothing goes as planned. But we want something that we can continue to like. We believe there's a place where we belong. That's why we sing

(Source: Official YouTube Channel)

name: Hokkyoku Hyakkaten no Concierge-san
aliases: The Concierge at Hokkyoku Department Store
The Concierge at Arctic Department Store
description:
"The word 'no' doesn't exist in a concierge's dictionary." That's just one of the demanding rules that Akino must abide by in her new job as a saleswoman at the elegant and expansive Hokkyoku Department Store. It's a very special store — the customers are all animals, and the most valued among them are of extinct species. Sea minks, laughing owls, Japanese wolves, even an enormous mammoth — that's Mr. Woolly, the celebrated sculptor whose works are showcased at the store. It's still a luxury retail space, though, and anxious Akino finds her hands full with the customers' challenging requests. These range from hard-to-find merchandise to more complicated matters of the heart. Can the inexperienced Akino fulfill their whims and meet their expectations? If she wants to keep her job, she'll have to succeed while under constant observation by the fussy floor manager Mr. Todo, a creepy consultant eager to downsize the staff, and the store's enigmatic president (who is not a penguin, by the way!).

(Source: Fantasia Festival)

name: Isekai System
description: A short film by Genshou Yasuda.

name: Street Fighter IV: Aftermath
description: A series of four animated prequels to Street Fighter IV, each centered on a different character. They depict events set after Street Fighter II.

name: Blue Eyes -in HARBOR TALE-
description: In a port town “Y”, where there are many old artifacts which are animated through a long time, a piece of brick lives as a pilot for the “guests” from overseas. One day, he meets a doll girl on a river and another tiny story begins.

name: Oroka na Tenshi wa Akuma to Odoru
aliases: The Foolish Angel Dances with the Devil
Oroka na Tenshi wa Akuma to Odoru
description:
The story centers on Masatora Akutsu, a demon who descends to the human world in search of "idols" to motivate the corrupt demons and to boost their morale. He quickly finds a potential idol, Lily Amane, and recruits her. However, Lily turns out to be an angel, the natural enemy of Akutsu and the other demons! While Akutsu tries to corrupt Lily to protect himself and his clan, Lily decides to rehabilitate Akutsu for her own hidden ambitions.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

name: Dragon Ball Z x Kao
description: Dragon Ball Z does a commercial with the Japanese brand Kao. It starts off with Bulma telling Vegeta to clean the bathroom. Vegeta notices how dirty the bathroom is and gets mad and uses his power to clean it, destroying a part of the bathroom. Soon after Bulma tells Vegeta there is another way to clean the bathroom by using Kao cleaning sprays.

name: Oboete Ite
description: A girl reflects on her memories of her grandfather.

name: Sankou Gakuen Iryou Hisho Senmon Gakkou
aliases: Sankou Gakuen Iryou Hisho Senmon Gakkou
description: A promotional video for Sankou Gakuen's medical secretary vocational program.

name: Mobile Suit Gundam: The Witch from Mercury Recap
aliases: Mobile Suit Gundam: The Witch from Mercury Recap
Kidou Senshi Gundam: Suisei no Majo Recap
description: Recap of the first six episodes of Mobile Suit Gundam: The Witch from Mercury.

name: Life of the Dead Episode 7
description: A shelved 7th episode of Life of the Dead that never received voice work or saw a formal release.

name: 667-tsuu no Love Letter
aliases: リプトン ミルクティー CM
description:
The story starts with how Touma and Yui met, and as time went on, seemingly are pining over each other through love letters after they're forced to part ways. Near the end of the advertisement, however, it's revealed that every line of dialogue actually comes from letters written by the public after Morinaga first announced it was discontinuing Lipton Milk Tea back in March 2022.

The advertisement is directed by Toshitaka Shinoda made for Morinaga Milk Industry, advertising the return of Lipton Milk Tea in carton form.

name: Aiyou de Mishi
description:
Yan Yuechu returned to his hometown to work and made new friends at his workplace. One day, he went to XY Escape Room and found himself deeply attracted to the proprietor, Xu Aiyou. However, that was when he started to experience strange escape room illusions. As Yan Yuechu got to know Xu Aiyou, more and more incidents started to happen around him and even his friends. In the process of solving the escape rooms and finding the mastermind behind all these events, he gradually found himself uncovering the truth behind his lost memories...

(Source: Bilibili YouTube channel)

name: Guardians of the Cosmos
description: A lost pilot episode of an Americanized Saint Seiya produced in the US in the 90s.

name: Goblin no Suana
description:
Wait a minute, isn't the Goblin Slayer supposed to show up and save them? Where is he?!

(Source: Hanime)

name: BanG Dream! It's MyGO!!!!!
description:
"Would you be in a band with me for the rest of your life?"

It’s the end of spring of Anon’s first year at Haneoka Girls’ Academy, and almost everyone seems to be in a band. In order to fit in with the rest of the class, Anon, who started school late, scurries to find band members, and finds out that “Haneoka's Weirdo" Tomori has yet to join any bands.

So Anon resolves to speak with Tomori at any cost but...

**Bruised and unseemly as it is, this is our music, our cry.**
**We may be lost, but we’ll keep on moving as the lost.**

name: Ensemble Stars!!: Tsuioku Selection - Element
description: New Ensemble Stars!! web animated series based on the game story "Element".

name: Spy Kyoushitsu 2nd season
description:
The second season of Spy Kyoushitsu.
Four members of the Din Republic's spy team Lamplight embark on a mission to capture an enemy spy. Although they struggle to work together due to their clashing personalities, Thea, Monika, Erna, and Annett complete their objective. While enjoying a short break, the four girls encounter a woman named Matilda, who claims to be Annett's mother. As they get to know Matilda, the team is dragged into an escalating conflict that tests their teamwork and allegiances.

Meanwhile, the remaining Lamplight members notice that the dispatched squad has yet to report back. Worried about their allies, Klaus and Lily set out on an emergency expedition to locate their missing teammates. As the two uncover troubling information about rising tensions in the area where their friends last were, they must act quickly to reassemble the team before the mission reaches the point of no return.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

name: Tokyo Gas "Polar Bear Shiritori" TV commercial
aliases: Tokyo Gas "Polar Bear Shiritori" TV commercial
description:
By depicting the daily lives of two polar bears, this commercial raises awareness of the issue of global warming and promotes efforts to recycle CO2 and synthesize methane, the main component of city gas (methanation).

(Source: MAL)

description: A short film by Tomoyasu Murata Company that played during costume changes between songs during Ai Otsuka's LOVE LETTER TOUR 2009.

aliases: One Piece Water Spectacle 3: Wano Kuni-hen
description:
One Piece Water Spectacle 3 is a Wano-focused show.

(Source: Fan Wiki)

name: One Piece Water Spectacle 2
description:
One Piece Water Spectacle 2 featured an original story of the Straw Hat Pirates visiting an island to investigate its legendary Great Rainbow treasure.

(Source: Fan Wiki)

name: One Piece Water Spectacle
description:
One Piece Water Spectacle highlighted the Straw Hat Pirates's abilities in scenes from the Fish-Man Island Arc, Punk Hazard Arc, and Dressrosa Arc.

(Source: Fan Wiki)

name: Puchi Cool Doji Danshi no Hito Koma
aliases: Puchi Cool Doji Danshi no Hito Koma
description: Mini anime of Cool Doji Danshi exclusively on the dTV streaming service.

name: The Last Adventure of Count Lance-Dur
aliases: The Last Adventure of Count Lance-Dur
description:
Transmedia project set approximately 30 years after the events of Wafku .

A former adventurer, old Lance Dur takes up arms again following the kidnapping of his granddaughter Ozie . With his old comrades, he embarks on his last quest.

(Source: Nautiljon, translated)

name: Ryza no Atelier: Tokoyami no Joou to Himitsu no Kakurega
aliases: Atelier Ryza: Ever Darkness & the Secret Hideout The Animation
Ryza no Atelier: Tokoyami no Joou to Himitsu no Kakurega
description:
The village of Rasenboden lies on Kurken Island, which is surrounded by a lake. Time travels slowly on this island that's on the outskirts of the Roteswasser Kingdom. In this quiet little village with very little excitement lived Ryza, a girl with entirely too much energy for this quiet village, whose main feature was that she's so ordinary that she has no outstanding features.

"Sigh... I wonder if there's anything interesting to do..."

Ryza wasn't satisfied with solely being known as an ordinary farmer's daughter in the uptight, boring little village. So one day, she sneaks onto a boat boat with her childhood friends Lent and Tao, and they have their first adventure to the opposite shore. There, she encounters a man who uses a mysterious power called alchemy. Ryza is completely enchanted by this power and asks him to teach it to her. From an ordinary farmer's daughter to an alchemist... This was something completely new. Their own little single summer adventure is about to begin—

(Source: Crunchyroll)

Note: The first episode aired with a runtime of ~48 minutes.

name: Dead Mount Death Play Part 2
description: The second cour of Dead Mount Death Play.

name: Hikari no Ou 2nd Season
description: The second season of Hikari no Ou.

name: Tsukin Daisensou
description:
The morning that changed history was a normal morning for them...

Seitaro Hongo is a hot-blooded office worker in his twenties. His rival is the "Hige Baron". They
don't even know each other's real names and have never talked to each other.

(Source: Official Website, translated)

name: Tokidoki Bosotto Russiago de Dereru Tonari no Alya-san
aliases: Alya Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian
Tokidoki Bosotto Russiago de Dereru Tonari no Alya-san
description:
Alisa Mikhailovna Kujou is Seiren Private Academy’s “solitary princess.” She’s a half-Russian beauty with silver hair, at the top of her class, student council accountant, and…completely unapproachable. For some reason, she’s also taken on the responsibility of reprimanding the slacker who sits next to her in class. Masachika Kuze is constantly frustrating her by falling asleep, forgetting his textbooks, and just being an overall unexemplary student. Or at least, that’s how it looks from the outside. She may put on a tough act, but she doesn’t mind Masachika as much as others would think. She even lets him call her by her nickname, Alya. Anyone hearing the comments she mutters in Russian under her breath might know how she really feels, but since none of her classmates understand the language, she’s free to say whatever she likes! Except…there is one person who knows what she’s saying. Masachika eavesdrops on her embarrassing revelations, pretending to be clueless, all the while wondering what her flirtatious comments actually mean!

(Source: Yen Press)

name: Mahou Shoujo ni Akogarete
description:
Hiragi Utena is a major fangirl of the magical girls protecting her city, so when she has the chance to become one herself, she leaps at the chance to join their technicolor ranks… but when she transforms, she learns she isn’t fated to be a daring do-gooder, but rather a villain on the side of evil! At first, she tries to quit her new gig as the leader of the local baddies, but she quickly realizes she enjoys it and is a total natural at tormenting the magical girls she loves so much. With both a bang and a whimper, Hiragi’s journey as a magical-girl-tormenting sadist has begun!

(Source: HIDIVE)

name: Kibou no Chikara: Otona Precure '23
description:
One of the anime projects to commemorate the 20th anniversary of the Precure franchise, this sequel will show Nozomi Yumehara and other characters from Yes! Precure 5 and Yes! Precure 5 GoGo! as grown-ups.

(Source: Anime News Network, edited)

name: Tsumurin: Funkoro Yakata ni Okurimono
aliases: Tsumurin: Presenting A Gift to Master Funkoro
Tsumurin: A Story About Going to Give a Gift to Master Funkoro
description: Tsumurin was adventuring in the forest when he found an amazing treasure! He'd love to give it to his friend, the Master Funkoro. He lives a long way from the forest. It's the start of another adventure!

name: Tsumurin: Korokoro Yamu no Daibouken
aliases: Tsumurin: Adventure of the Korokoro Mountain
description: This is an animation in which the character Tsumurin rolls around. Let's Rolling Ball!

name: S - The Birth of Psycho
description: Graduation work of Woohyun Kim at Tama Art University.

name: Kimi no Koto ga Dai Dai Dai Dai Daisuki na 100-nin no Kanojo
aliases: The 100 Girlfriends Who Really, Really, Really, Really, REALLY Love You
Kimi no Koto ga Dai Dai Dai Dai Daisuki na 100-nin no Kanojo
description:
Rentaro Aijo was rejected 100 times in middle school. He visits a shrine and prays for better luck in high school. The God of Love appears and promises that he’ll soon meet 100 people he’s destined to date. But there’s a catch—once destiny introduces someone to him, the two must happily love each other. If they don’t, they’ll die. What will befall Rentaro and his 100 girlfriends in high school?

(Source: Crunchyroll)

name: Nanatsu no Taizai: Ensa no Edinburgh - Kouhen
aliases: The Seven Deadly Sins: Grudge of Edinburgh Part 2
Nanatsu no Taizai: Ensa no Edinburgh - Kouhen
description: The second half of The Seven Deadly Sins: Grudge of Edinburgh.

name: Potion-danomi de Ikinobimasu!
description:
One day, the supervisor in charge of watching over Earth was taking care of a distortion, when they made a mistake that caused Kaoru Nagase to lose her physical body. Not only that, but reincarnating her into a different, less culturally advanced world is the only thing they can offer to do for her. Not one to take this turn of events sitting down, Kaoru makes a demand: the power to create potions at any time she pleases, with whatever effect she wants it to have—and it doesn’t stop there either. She asks for a magical Item Box, the ability to understand and speak every language, and the same body she had back when she was a fifteen-year-old girl. Using her newfound powers, Kaoru has to try and make a stable life for herself in a whole new world!

(Source: J-Novel Club)

name: Kyuujitsu no Warumono-san
description:
An Evil Organization from another planet is trying to take over Earth. An extraterrestrial from that organization named the "General" tirelessly fights against Earth's defenders every single day in a battle of life and death! However, today is his day off.

(Source: MANGA UP!)

name: Kawagoe Boys Sing
description:
The story is about the Kawagoe School Boys Choir Club and their instructor, a former orchestra conductor named Haruo Hibiki. The club members' personalities clash, but Haruo helps them grow together through singing, as they aim for the nationals of the Boys Choir contest.

(Source: Anime News Network, edited)

name: Lian Qi Shi Wan Nian
aliases: One Hundred Thousand Years of Qi Training
description: One hundred thousand years ago, he was the founding disciple of the Tianlan Sect, his master ascended to the top, and he was refining Qi. Ninety thousand years ago, his martial nephew ascended, and he was refining Qi. Fifty thousand years ago, the old dog who was the gatekeeper of Tianlanzong also ascended, and he was still refining Qi. Thirty thousand years ago, the old tree at the foot of the mountain also became a demon, and he was still refining Qi before he could pass the catastrophe. Ten thousand years ago, Zhang Wuji, the 9872nd generation disciple of Tianlanzong, also ascended, and Xu Yang silently refined Qi. He retreated for 10,000 years, and finally, he broke through the 9999th floor of the Qi refining period! Ten thousand years later, he broke through and came out!

name: Hidari Pilot Film
description: Pilot film for a stop motion film animated with puppets carved out of wood and featuring the legendary sculptor Hidari Jingorou as protagonist.

name: Factory
description: Two contributions by Mirai Mizue to the SPACE SHOWER TV Canvas 2.0.0 campaign. Space Shower TV is a music video channel in Japan similar to MTV. Between segments there are sometimes small animations featuring the station ID. The campaign was launched to invite all animators to come and submit works featuring the station's ID. The only requirement was that the animation is between 15-90 seconds in length. In order to encourage indie artists, all videos were shown on the specially created website; and 10 professional artists' creations (including Mirai Mizue) were already there to give examples of what Space Shower TV was looking for in content.

name: Dreamland
description: Short animation from Mirai Mizue. Simple rectilinear figures assemble into surprisingly complex “cities” that pulse along to Scarlatti Goes Electro’s hyperkinetic score.

name: Korakuen Yuuenchi: Luna Park
description: An animated TV commercial for the Japanese Amusement Park 'Korakuen Yuuenchi' directed by Katsuhiro Otomo. Otomo's illustrations are also been used in the printed campaign.

name: Beolineun Seom
description: A dog has been abandoned in an island and waits to see his owner. But the owner comes and goes back again and again.

name: Turquoise Blue Honeymoon
description: In the future when interplanetary cruises are popular form of travel, Masao and Nana, who recently got married, embark to Mars for their honeymoon. The travel is a one-way, 150-day journey in a two-seater spacecraft. After awaking out of artificial hibernation, they quickly realize something has gone wrong.

name: Iron Pulse
description: A small family-owned iron factory was closed down. What will remain of it?

name: Love Letter
description: Music video for the song Love Letter by YOASOBI.

name: Attack on Titan: The Final Season - Final Chapters Part 2
aliases: Attack on Titan: The Final Season - Final Chapters Part 2
Shingeki no Kyojin: The Final Season Kanketsu-Hen (Kouhen)
Attack on Titan Season 4 Part 4, Attack on Titan Season 4 - Final Edition (Part 2), Attack on Titan: The Final Season - Final Edition (Part 2)
Attack on Titan Final Season THE FINAL CHAPTERS Special 2
Attack on Titan: The Final Season Part 4
description:
Eren, as the Founding Titan, advances on Fort Salta with countless other Titans. Appearing before the refugees, who stand on the brink of despair, are Mikasa, Armin, Jean, Conny, Reiner, Pieck, and Levi, who narrowly escaped from the rumbling. The battle between former comrades and childhood friends with Eren concludes here.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

name: 20-pun de Oitsukeru: Shingeki no Kyojin
aliases: Catch up in 20 minutes! Anime "Attack on Titan" Digest
description:
20 minutes to catch up with the contents of Season 1 to The Final Season Part 1.

(Source: Official YouTube Channel)

name: 15-pun de Oitsukeru: Shingeki no Kyojin
aliases: Catch up in 15 minutes! Anime "Attack on Titan" Digest
description:
A special video that catches up with the contents from Season 1 to Season 3.

(Source: Official YouTube Channel)

name: 10-pun de Oitsukeru: Shingeki no Kyojin
aliases: Catch up in 10 minutes! Anime "Attack on Titan" Season 1-2 Digest
description:
A special video that can catch up with the contents from Season 1 to Season 2 in 10 minutes.

(Source: Official YouTube Channel)

name: Bus to Hero
description: Graduation work of Marika Matsunaga at Tama Art University.

name: MOM
description: 2013 Graduation work of Hidemi Yamashita at Tama Art University.

name: Kutushita
description:
One day at school, a kid gets his socks so dirty while playing with his friends. Afraid of being scolded by his mother, he hides the socks at home so she won’t be able to find them. However, by doing so, the kid gets to feel more and more frightened, imagining what if they get found, and overwhelmed by the feeling of guilty.

・Sapporo International Short Film Festival 8th Best Non-Dialog Award. ・10th Asiana International Short Film Festival（AISFF2012） ・ANIMATEKA2012　the Elephant International Children Competition Programme ・12th International Festival of Animated Films AniFest ・59th International Short Film Festival Oberhausen　the Children’s and Youth Film Competition ・KIKI - 2nd International Children's Film Festival, Croatia ・Animage 2013 ・32th Vancouver International Film Festival

name: Yangguang Kafei Ting Zhi Xin You Ji
Crayon Shin-chan: Nazo Meki! Hana no Tenkasu Gakuen
aliases: Crayon Shin-chan: Shrouded in Mystery! The Flowers of Tenkazu Academy
Crayon Shin-chan: Nazo Meki! Hana no Tenkasu Gakuen
Crayon Shin-chan Movie 29: Mystery Meki! Hana no Tenkasu Gakuen
description: The film's story begins with Shinnosuke and his friends of "Kasukabe Defence Force" experiencing a one-week stay in "Tenkatōitsu Kasukabe Private Academy" (nicknamed "Tenkazu"), an elite boarding school that is administrated by a state-of-the-art AI, "Otsmun". All the students are given a badge initially with 1000 points and their points are increased/decreased by Otsmun based on their behaviors and academic performance. In there someone attacks Kazama. As a result, his intelligence is reduced, and strange bite marks are left on his butt. The Kasukabe Defense Force joins forces with the school's dropout student council president Chishio Atsuki, who was a former athlete, to form a group of detectives and solve the mystery.

name: Crayon Shin-chan: Mononoke Ninja Chinpuuden
aliases: Crayon Shinchan the Movie: The Tornado Legend of Ninja Mononoke
Shin - Cậu Bé Bút Chì: Truyền Thuyết Nhẫn Thuật Ninja
Crayon Shin-chan Movie 30: Mononoke Ninja Chinpuuden
Eiga Crayon Shin-chan: Mononoke Ninja Chinfuuden
description: The film features Shinnosuke as a ninja, and will reveal if Shinnosuke is the real son of Hiroshi and Misae.

name: Li Shi Zhentan Shiwusuo: A Day in Lungmen Special
aliases: Lee's Detective Agency: Once Upon a Time in Lungmen
description: A special episode released between episodes 5 and 6 of Lee's Detective Agency. It is styled like works from the golden age of American animation and features no dialogue.

name: Fanren Xiu Xian Zhuan: Fanren Feng Qi Tian Nan Chongzhi Ban
aliases: A Record Of Mortal's Journey To Immortality Remastered Edition
description: Remaster of the first season of Fanren Xiu Xian Zhuan.

name: 4.Eyes Re-Mix 2005
description: A remix of the short film 4.Eyes by Keiichi Tanaami.

name: 0 Man
description:
This sci-fi story centers around Ricky, a Zero Man raised by humans in Tokyo. Zero Men are very similar to humans, but their intelligence and strength is far greater, while also sharing similar characteristics to squirrels. When Ricky finds out that the Zero Men are planning to go to war with the human race, it’s up to him to try and put a stop to the conflict and save his adopted family.

Note: 0 Man is a Shounen manga created by Osamu Tezuka that was serialized from September 13th, 1959 to December 11th, 1960. In 1968, a four-minute pilot was made by Mushi Productions in the hopes that the series would be picked up and turned into its own show, much like what was done with Kimba the White Lion and Astro Boy. However, due to budget constraints, it was cancelled. The pilot has not surfaced since, however material such as concept art and storyboards have been found.

name: Mietchi Cuisine
aliases: How to make Mietti Cuisine Hachis Parmentier
description:
A cooking show-style animation produced in collaboration with Mietti Cuisine.
A fun introduction to how to make "Hachis Parmentier", one of the typical French home cooking.

name: Factory
description: Graduation work of Chihiro Okamoto at Tama Art University.

name: Ahiru ga Tonda Hi
description: Graduation work of Rikako Matsuno at Tama Art University.

name: so near yet so far
description: Graduation work of Komitsu Fujihata at Tama Art University.

name: BONKEI
description: Graduation work of Yuki Maeda at Tama Art University.

name: Ren Mian Tao Hua
aliases: A Charming Face Among Peach Blossoms
description: Xi Chen's 2015 Graduate School 1st Year Tama Art University Production

name: Ochichi wo Suitai
description: This animation is emotional and dreamy story about love of three bees.

name: lovesome
description: Graduation work of Rina Tsukamoto at Tama Art University.

name: Voice
description: A film by OBAYASHI Tomoe.

name: Futari-bun no Shoumei
aliases: Ｚ会グループ × loundraw × FLAT STUDIO 受験生応援ムービー
description:
A short directed by loundraw. Made as a collaboration between Z-Kai Group, loundraw, and FLAT STUDIO.

Ever felt nervous about an impending exam or test? We've all been there. The story will follow three friends grappling with school, studies, and relationships.

name: Quanzhi Fashi 6
description: The sixth season of Quanzhi Fashi.

name: Otogibanashi no Onigokko
description:
Red Riding Hood, Snow White, Alice...
Classic stories everyone knows... but what if they were distorted according to the reader's desires?

(Source: DLsite English)

name: Kyouki Sanmyaku: Naked Peak
aliases: Naked Peak: Climb the Mountains of Madness
description:
A tourist jet to Antarctica mysteriously went missing.
When a search team got to the point where the signal disappeared, they couldn't find the jet but they were met with a range of mountains unknown to humankind.

The unprecedented mountain range, with a height of over 34,000ft above sea level, surpassing Mount Everest, was beyond human comprehension.

――People“The Mountains of Madness”

Some daring souls are now attempting to reach that violent mountain.
What will they encounter beyond the realm of death?

name: Kekkon Yubiwa Monogatari
description:
Satou and his best friend, Hime, have been together for as long as he can remember. So when she tells him she's going back to her home world to get married, his first thought is to follow her and crash her wedding. All goes according to plan, and with a kiss from Hime herself, Satou becomes the new groom! But unbeknownst to Satou, the man who marries Hime is destined to be a hero of immense power and save the world! Is Satou up for the challenge, or is this just too much responsibility for one high schooler to handle?!

(Source: Yen Press)

name: DOG SIGNAL
description:
A dog trainer is a job that connects dogs and people. An indecisive young man, Miyu Samura, met Shinichiro Niwa, a miracle-working dog trainer, while walking the dog of his ex-girlfriend.
